item.title: Reverse Mode Autodiff
item.description: 背景 怎么算微分。。通常有三种方法。 Symbolic Differentiation Numerical Differentiation Automatic Differentiation (auto diff) auto diff中两种主流的方式分别是forward-mode和reverse-mode 由于fo
